{"id":626821927,"lang":"java","time":"6 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1643036701,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/626821927/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Detect Capital","memory":"39.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean detectCapitalUse(String word) {\n        int n = word.length();\n\n        boolean match1 = true, match2 = true, match3 = true;\n\n        // case 1: All capital\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            if (!Character.isUpperCase(word.charAt(i))) {\n                match1 = false;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (match1) {\n            return true;\n        }\n\n        // case 2: All not capital\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            if (!Character.isLowerCase(word.charAt(i))) {\n                match2 = false;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (match2) {\n            return true;\n        }\n\n        // case 3: All not capital except first\n        if (!Character.isUpperCase(word.charAt(0))) {\n            match3 = false;\n        }\n        if (match3) {\n            for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {\n                if (!Character.isLowerCase(word.charAt(i))) {\n                    match3 = false;\n                    break;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        if (match3) {\n            return true;\n        }\n\n        // if not matching\n        return false;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"detect-capital"}
